## 1.3.0 Set up
importation librairies

```{r}
library(vroom)
library(here)
library(ggplot2)
```
```{r}
here::i_am('Data_management_Project.Rproj')
HDI <- vroom(here("raw_data", "HDR25_Statistical_Annex_HDI_Table.xlsx."))
```
```{r}
Environmental_Policy_Stringency_Index<- vroom(here("raw_data", "OECD.ECO.MAD,DSD_EPS@DF_EPS,1.0,filtered,2025-11-19 13-27-34.xlsx"))
```
```{r}
Renewable_Electricity_Share<- vroom(here("raw_data", "yearly_full_release_long_format.csv"))
```
```{r}
Temperature_exposure<- vroom(here("raw_data", "OECD.ENV.EPI,DSD_ECH@EXT_TEMP_H,2.0,filtered,2025-11-19 13-23-57.xlsx"))
```

#### Unzipping the files
```{r}
zip_files <- list.files(
  here("raw_data"),
  pattern = "\\.zip$",
  full.names = TRUE
)

for (f in zip_files) {
  unzip(f, exdir = here("data_file"))
}
```
